news.title: Construction workers' registration progresses at slow pace, only 14 lakh sign up in Maharashtra
news.para: Officials attributed the poor enrolment to lack of required documents, making unregistered workers and their family members ineligible for various welfare schemes.

news.title: Mohali: Gmada e-auction postponed as Punjab chief secretary raises objection
news.para: All the properties being offered were located in developed sectors/urban estates. The sites were planned to be allotted on receiving 10% payment of the final bid price.

news.title: Jamshedpur: Buildings near Subernarekha, Dalma violating green rules to face action
news.para: Deputy commissioner (DC) Manjunath Bhajantri said those responsible for constructions within the eco-sensitive zone (ESZ) in violation of the National Green Tribunal (NGT) guidelines will face action.

news.title: Bengaluru: HRBR Layout residents demand cancellation of licences to illegal buildings
news.para: While apartments should be ideally 5300 sq ft, minimum apartments for less than that are being built. Some of the apartments have more than three floors, and commercial buildings have no parking spaces, he added.

news.title: About 28 construction sites sealed for violating air pollution rules
news.para: The civic body had sealed 41 construction sites in the city on Thursday for non-compliance with air pollution guidelines. This action was initiated in response to a circular issued by the Ahmedabad Municipal Corporation on April 17.

news.title: CBRE cuts profit forecast as high rates hurt property market
news.para: CBRE now expects core profit per share to fall by mid-30% in 2023, compared with its previous forecast of a 20-25% decline.

news.title: Mumbai AQI: Construction dust to blame for chronic bad air spots
news.para: For instance, in Andheri (West), residents of the 12-story Chitralekha Heritage Society are fed up with the daily influx of construction debris-laden trucks into their neighborhood, which they believe is causing severe health problems.

news.title: Act against two projects of Janta Land Promoters: Governor to Punjab CM
news.para: The governor has termed two projects – ‘Super Mega Mixed Use Integrated Industrial Park’ and ‘Galaxy Heights’ by Janta Land Promoters Limited (JLPL) in violation of the Centre’s environmental regulations, as observed by MoEFCC.

news.title: Gurugram: HSVP clears 2,000 shanties to free land for housing project
news.para: The development came after the Punjab and Haryana high court directed the HSVP to conduct a survey of the area that is under encroachment and share details of the action taken by it.

news.title: Oberoi Realty's net profit up 43.36% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Oberoi Realty's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,243.80 crore, a growth of 74.74 per cent from Rs 711.79 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Saint-Gobain reports declining sales on volume drop, currency headwind
news.para: Third-quarter sales were down 10.5% year-on-year at 11.6 billion euros ($12.2 billion). Analysts had expected sales of 11.5 billion. Saint-Gobain also reported a 5% decrease in volumes and a 3.9% currency effect, both in line with expectations.

news.title: Madurai: Villagers hold sit-in protest against granite quarrying
news.para: In a statement dated October 10, the Madurai district administration announced calling for tenders for quarrying multi-colour granite stones in Sekkipatti, Ayyapatti and Thiruchunai villages in Melur block for a period of 20 years.

news.title: Construction sector in Mangaluru to be affected due to sand crisis
news.para: Civil Contractors Association, Mangaluru, president Mahabala Kottary told reporters here on Thursday, that the shortage of sand in the district has affected the construction industry severely.

news.title: Gurugram: About 95 fined for violating GRAP rules in October
news.para: Most penalties (33) were issued for not covering construction materials, which is one of the major reasons for dust pollution.

news.title: Mahindra Lifespaces' net loss widens to Rs 18.93 crore in Q2 FY24
news.para: Mahindra Lifespaces' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 26.70 crore, a dip of 63.83 per cent from Rs 73.82 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: M3M group's promoter withdraws bail plea
news.para: Soon after Panchkula additional district and sessions judge Praveen Kumar Lal took up the case, the defense counsel informed the court about instructions from his client to withdraw the application, which the court allowed.

news.title: Ludhiana development body demolishes illegal colonies
news.para: They dismantled their roads, boundary walls, passages, street lights, sewer manholes and other constructions. The five unauthorised colonies were located at villages of Daad, Lalton, Jhande and Thareeke.

news.title: Raze eight floors of building added 'most brazenly': Bombay HC
news.para: The extra floors were "most brazenly added" to the building located near Mandvi by misusing stay orders, observed the court. Shocked at the blatant violations, it ordered BMC to forthwith demolish the additional structures.

news.title: BigBloc Construction expects revenue growth of 25-30% in FY24
news.para: Over the period of 18-24 months, BigBloc Construction is looking to invest Rs 150-200 crore. About 60-65% of the capital expenditure will be funded through debt and 30-35% equity.
